settings.hero_subtitle: Your comprehensive resource center for safety documentation, best practices, incident reports, and technical guidance. Access thousands of curated documents from industry experts and regulatory bodies.

settings.document_description: Updated safety manual incorporating latest ASTM F24 standards and industry best practices. Essential reading for all safety professionals.

settings.category_description: ASTM, IAAPA, OSHA, and state-specific safety standards and regulatory documents.
settings.documents_json: ASTM F24.20-2024: Operations & Maintenance::Standard practice for operation and maintenance of amusement rides and devices.::::Jan 2025::|ASTM F24.30-2023: Patron Safety::Standard for patron safety requirements and design criteria for amusement rides.::::Dec 2024::|ASTM F24.50-2024: Water-Based Attractions::Safety standards specific to water rides, wave pools, and aquatic attractions.::::Nov 2024::|IAAPA Ride Operations Manual 2025::Comprehensive operational guidelines for amusement ride operations and safety management.::::Jan 2025::|IAAPA Safety Management Systems Guide::Framework for implementing comprehensive safety management systems in attractions.::::Dec 2024::

settings.category_description: Detailed procedures for ride operations, maintenance protocols, and safety systems.
settings.documents_json: Daily Inspection Procedures::Comprehensive daily inspection checklists and procedures for all ride types.::::2024::|Height Verification Protocols::Step-by-step procedures for accurate height verification and documentation.::::2024::|Restraint System Checks::Detailed inspection procedures for all restraint system types.::::2024::|Weather-Related Shutdowns::Procedures for weather monitoring and ride closure decisions.::::2024::|Guest Loading Procedures::Safe guest loading and unloading procedures for various ride types.::::2024::|Preventive Maintenance Schedules::Comprehensive maintenance scheduling and tracking procedures.::::2024::|Lockout/Tagout Procedures::OSHA-compliant LOTO procedures for ride maintenance and repair.::::2024::|Non-Destructive Testing Protocols::NDT procedures for structural integrity assessment.::::2024::

settings.category_description: Anonymized incident reports, root cause analyses, and lessons learned documentation.
settings.documents_json: Incident Investigation Procedures::Comprehensive guide to investigating and documenting safety incidents.::::2024::|Root Cause Analysis Methods::Systematic approaches to identifying underlying causes of incidents.::::2024::|Incident Reporting Templates::Standardized forms and templates for incident documentation.::::2024::|Near Miss Reporting Program::Guidelines for implementing effective near miss reporting systems.::::2024::|Lessons Learned Database::Compilation of lessons learned from industry incidents.::::2024::|Communication Protocols::Procedures for internal and external incident communication.::::2024::

settings.category_description: Comprehensive guides covering specific safety topics, equipment, and procedures.
settings.documents_json: Ride Safety Management Guide::Comprehensive guide to implementing ride safety management systems.::::2024::|Electrical Safety for Rides::Electrical safety requirements and best practices for amusement rides.::::2024::|Structural Inspection Guide::Guidelines for structural inspection and assessment of ride components.::::2024::|Guest Safety Guidelines::Best practices for ensuring guest safety throughout the park experience.::::2024::|Emergency Evacuation Planning::Comprehensive guide to emergency evacuation planning and procedures.::::2024::
